active_learning.discussion_prompt: In a group discussion, debate the pros and cons of aggressive short-term containment (e.g., full network shutdown) versus conservative approaches (e.g., IP blocking) in a live production environment during a detected ransomware attack. Reference NIST SP 800-61 and justify your position using real-world trade-offs like business impact and forensic preservation.
active_learning.peer_teaching: Explain the key concepts to a partner without using technical jargon.
active_learning.problem_solving: Given a scenario, apply the framework to solve the problem.

distractor_protocol.step: Identify common misconceptions about the topic
Ensure distractors are similar in length and complexity
Include partial truths that require deeper understanding
